TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl
.class public auto ansi UserControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供一种创建控件的简单方法。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的控件支持丰富的内容、样式、触发器和模板。Controls in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] support rich content, styles, triggers, and templates. 在许多情况下，这些功能可让你创建自定义和一致的体验，而无需创建新的控件。In many cases, these features allow you to create custom and consistent experiences without having to create a new control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). 如果确实需要创建新控件，最简单的方法是创建从 派生的类。If you do need to create a new control, the simplest way is to create a class that derives from . 在执行此操作之前，请考虑您的控件将不支持模板，因此不支持复杂的自定义。Before you do so, consider that your control will not support templates and therefore will not support complex customization. 但是，如果你想要通过向控件添加现有元素来生成控件（与生成应用程序的方式类似），并且无需支持复杂的自定义，则从 派生。However, deriving from is a suitable model if you want to build your control by adding existing elements to it, similar to how you build an application, and if you do not need to support complex customization. （如果要将模板与控件一起使用，请改为从 派生。）有关用于创作控件的不同模型的详细信息，请参阅[控件创作概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview)。(If you want to use templates with your control, derive from instead.) For more information about the different models for authoring controls, see [Control Authoring Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview). 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象（例如字符串、图像或面板）。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建简单的 `NumericUpDown`。The following example shows how to create a simple `NumericUpDown`. [!code-xaml[UserControlNumericUpDown#Markup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/NumericUpDown.xaml#markup)] 下面显示了此 的逻辑：The following shows the logic of this : [!code-csharp[UserControlNumericUpDown#CodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/NumericUpDown.xaml.cs#codebehind)] [!code-vb[UserControlNumericUpDown#CodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/visualbasic/numericupdown.xaml.vb#codebehind)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[控件创作概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview)。For more information, see [Control Authoring Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview).
